attributes.action: teach languages in schools from the age of 5
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In germany, france and I'm sure, many others, they learn English and other languages from the age of 5 - 6.

I think this should be done in Britain too. Languages is a slowly dying skill, so should be taught much earlier.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "teach languages in schools from the age of 5."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here:
